duties_responsibilities.duty: Become an expert on full-stack web development and computer science concepts.
Deliver project-based tech classes to a broad range of ages and learning abilities, utilizing the Coded by Kids curriculum.
Support in the development of curriculum materials with other members of the instructional team.
Participate in instructor training and staff meetings.
Cultivate a classroom culture of high achievement that is consistent with Coded By Kids’ core values.
Routinely update student records using the Coded By Kids’ online platforms.
Write class reflections on student progress, curriculum, and program updates.
Perform other duties, as necessary, to successfully implement Coded By Kids programs and curricula.
After the probationary period, the instructor will receive an appropriate specialization for their primary learning, creation, and teaching focus.

education_certification.credential: High school, GED, or equivalent diploma. A Bachelor's Degree from an accredited college or university preferred, but not required.
